start.description: So, you want to learn something. That's admirable af. I mean, you're here, learning this. But you want to search for more stuff to learn! You could use Google, but Google remembers you and then it sometimes talks to the cops about you behind your back which is rude.

nextSteps.prompt: So who can I ask if not Google?
Eh, sounds fine. What could go wrong?

duckduckgo.description: A cool tool you can use if you don't want big Google tracking you and remembering who you are is DuckDuckGo. DuckDuckGo is a search engine that doesn't track you, store your personal information, or track you.

nextSteps.prompt: Cool, I'll totally use that now.
idk if I'm going to remeber to use Duck Duck Go instead :/
You sound paranoid af, bud. I'll keep my infoboxes.

chrome.description: No problem, we totally get that! You can install addons for Chrome or FireFox that make Duck Duck Go your default search engine so you don't have to think about it!

nextSteps.prompt: Wow nice, I installed an add on!
Meh, still seems hard an annoying.

aww.description: Well, if you want to use Google we won't stop you. But know that you're always being watched, tracked, remembered and profited from.

yay.description: Cool. Enjoy your new untracked searches!

action.tweet: I got a merit badge for keeping my searches secret! pic.twitter.com/c2ZfVW6ymZ Check out http://cutealism.com/fight

nextSteps.prompt: I want to do something else now!
